user_question.text: I am unhappy in my current job. Any ideas in what direction I could go instead?

mate_response.text:
Of course! Since you mentioned that you have a background in marketing and enjoy storytelling, we could look for roles that leverage those skills.

To get a better sense of direction, could you tell me:
1. What aspects of your previous jobs did you find most fulfilling?
mate_response.context: AI response to career change question

user_question.text: What events are happening the coming days?

mate_response.text: There are some exciting events going on the coming days! Both to help you learn for a better career and to socialize more.

book_club.text: Book Lovers' Social: An Evening of Reading and Discussion

user_question.text: What is the next available cardiologist appointment, that doesn't collide with my calendar?

mate_initial.text: Let me quickly check your calendar and search for available doctor appointments. I will come back to you in a minute.
mate_initial.context: Initial AI response about checking calendar

mate_response.text: The best appointment I could find is tomorrow at 9:00. Doesn't collide with your product launch meeting later that day.

section_title.context: Title of the design guidelines section

text.text: In today's turbulent world, where profit-at-all-costs companies frequently misuse user data, where companies with inadequate security measures are regularly hacked and their users' data falls into the hands of bad actors, and where we cannot always rely on governments to protect the rights and well-being of their citizens, making decisions to safeguard your privacy has become increasingly essential.

subtext.text:
Therefore,
OpenMates is designed
with a focus on privacy.

headline_1.context: Used in 'Maximum good, not maximum greed.'

headline_2.context: Used in 'Maximum good, not maximum greed.'

text.text: Over recent years, profit-at-all-cost tech monopolies have over and over again prioritized their greed instead of the interests of their users and our planet, ignoring the negative consequences and destruction caused by those decisions. We can't just continue like that.
text.context: Main text explaining maximum good philosophy

subtext.text:
Therefore,
OpenMates is designed
with a focus on maximizing the positive impact of AI.

description.text: OpenMates is a community effort. From software developers, to designers, to users who are just excited about how AI can help them at work and in everyday life - everyone can contribute in valuable ways.

heading.context: Section heading for data protection overview

overview.text: This privacy policy explains what happens to your data when you use our website. We are committed to transparency regarding data handling.

current_state.text: We currently do not collect, store, or process any personal data directly through this website. The website is hosted via Vercel, and your interaction with this site is subject to Vercel's privacy practices.

heading.context: Section heading for Vercel hosting information

description.text: This website is hosted using Vercel's platform. When you visit this website, your request is processed by Vercel's servers. Vercel may collect technical information including:

more_info.text: For more information about Vercel's data practices, please refer to the Vercel Privacy Policy.

privacy_policy_link.context: Link text for Vercel's privacy policy

description.text: If you choose to join our Discord community through links provided on this website, please note that Discord will collect and process your data according to their privacy policy. This includes:

other.text: Other information as outlined in Discord's privacy policy
other.context: Reference to additional Discord data collection

admin_access.text: As Discord server administrators, we have access to all public communications, member lists, and other information shared within our Discord community. However, this information is hosted and primarily processed by Discord. We do not extract, store, or process this data outside of Discord's platform. For more information about how Discord handles your data, please review Discord's Privacy Policy.
admin_access.context: Description of admin access to Discord data

privacy_policy_link.context: Link text for Discord's privacy policy

title.context: Title of terms and conditions page

description.text: By accessing and using the OpenMates website ("Website"), you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access the Website.

OpenMates is currently a closed-source software project during its initial development phase. This temporary closed-source status is maintained to ensure security and stability during the early development and beta testing phases. The project will transition to open-source after the completion of initial beta testing and security reviews. This Website serves as an informational platform about the OpenMates project and its development progress.

The OpenMates name, logo, and all related content on this Website are the intellectual property of the website owner (see Imprint) and are protected by applicable copyright and trademark laws. Once the project transitions to open-source, specific licensing terms will be provided separately through appropriate open-source documentation.

Permission is granted to temporarily access the materials on our Website for personal, non-commercial informational purposes only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:

commercial.text: Use the materials for any commercial purpose

reverse_engineer.text: Attempt to reverse engineer any software contained on the Website

copyright.text: Remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials

description.text: Access to our Discord community is provided as a complementary service. When joining our Discord community, you agree to:

tos.text: Comply with Discord's Terms of Service and Community Guidelines

age.text: Be at least 16 years old or have parental consent

respect.text: Behave respectfully towards other community members

content.text: Not share inappropriate, illegal, or harmful content

description.text: The materials and information on this Website are provided 'as is' and without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or usefulness of any information on this Website. Any reliance you place on such information is strictly at your own risk.
To the fullest extent permitted by law, the website owner shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or special damages arising out of or in any way connected with:

website_use.text: The use or inability to use this Website

information.text: The information provided on this Website

explanation.text: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Federal Republic of Germany. For details about the responsible jurisdiction and contact information, please refer to our Imprint.

description.text: Description

credits_explainer.text:
Credits on OpenMates are used to chat with your digital team mates and to use apps on OpenMates.
Credits cannot be payed out and a refund is only possible within the first 14 days of purchase, and only for the remaining credits in your user account.

vat_disclaimer.text: According to §19 UStG, no VAT is shown as the seller is a small business under German law.

ask_team_mates.text: Ask @Helena (Help & Support), your digital team mate (via app.openmates.org)

ask_in_discord.text: Ask in our Discord for general billing questions (join via discord.gg/{discord_group_invite_code})

contact_via_email.text: Contact us via e-mail if these options don’t solve your problem ({email_address})

this_invoice_is_a_translation.text:
This invoice is a translation of the original invoice in english.
The english version remains the legally binding document for tax purposes.
